ing: 1/2 fluid ounce coffee-flavored liqueur (such as KahluaÂ®)
1/2 fluid ounce Irish cream liqueur (such as Bailey'sÂ®)
des: "This layered shot will, quite frankly, get you bombed."
ins: Pour coffee liqueur into a shot glass. Carefully pour in Irish cream liqueur so it floats on top. Pour triple sec on top so it floats as well, to create a three-layered drink.
